text: Affluenza is a term used by critics of consumerism. Affluenza may also refer to: *Affluenza: The All-Consuming Epidemic, 2001 book by John de Graaf *Affluenza: When Too Much is Never Enough, 2005 book written by Clive Hamilton and Richard Denniss *Affluenza, 2007 book by Oliver James *Affluenza (film), 2014 American drama film *"Affluenza", song by Conan Gray from the 2020 album Kid Krow *"Affluenza", song by Theory of a Deadman from their 2020 album Say Nothing
title: Affluenza (disambiguation)
